title: Archive juststeve.com across decades
description: Complete archive of juststeve.com covering all significant changes from 1997 to present

title: Build Vue.js frontend for timeline visualization
description: Create interactive Vue.js dashboard for visualizing archive timelines, snapshots, and analysis reports

title: Write unit tests for TypeScript and Python modules
description: Implement Jest tests for TypeScript modules and pytest for Python utilities, targeting 70% coverage threshold

title: Update README with hybrid architecture documentation
description: Document the TypeScript/Python/Vue hybrid architecture, setup instructions, and usage examples

title: Design Bitwarden auth integration for enterprise
description: Multiple projects will share credential services from Bitwarden. Design the linkage pattern, service architecture, and implementation strategy for enterprise-wide authentication

title: Analyze juststeve.com CDX history
description: Run cdx_analyzer.py to discover all unique snapshots and calculate change scores

title: Generate timeline visualization
description: Create HTML/text/JSON timeline reports showing changes over time

title: Select snapshots for download
description: Choose which snapshots to archive using selection strategy

title: Convert timeline generator to TypeScript
description: Migrate generate_timeline.py to TypeScript with MVC pattern, comprehensive error handling, and Vue.js-compatible JSON output

title: Convert snapshot selector to TypeScript
description: Migrate select_snapshots.py to TypeScript with MVC pattern and comprehensive error handling

title: Convert wayback crawler to TypeScript
description: Migrate wayback_crawler.py to TypeScript with MVC pattern, comprehensive error handling, and off-peak scheduling

title: Create Python utilities for specialized data processing
description: Build Python modules in python_utils/ for data analysis, text processing, and tasks that leverage Python's strengths
